#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int cmpfunc (const void * a, const void * b)
{
   return ( *(int*)a - *(int*)b );
}

int main() {
    int t; 
    scanf ("%d",&t);
    while (t--) {
          int n; 
          scanf("%d",&n);
          int *wc = (int *)malloc(sizeof(int)*n-1);
          int *lw = (int *)malloc(sizeof(int)*n-1);
          int i = 0;
          for (; i < n; i++ ) 
              scanf("%d",&wc[i]);
          for (i=0 ; i<n ;i++ )
              scanf("%d",&lw[i]);
          qsort(wc,n,sizeof(int),cmpfunc);
          qsort(lw,n,sizeof(int),cmpfunc);
          int j,k ;
          for (i=j=k=0; i < n && j < n;) {
              if ( wc[i] <= lw[j] ) {
                 j++;
                 k++; 
                 i++;
                
                 }
              else{
                  j++; 
              }
          }
          free(wc);
          free(lw);
          printf ("%d\n",k);
    }
    
    return 0;
}
